channel.description: SSO app use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Need to inlcude a SSO + Universal Logout use case Links to original docs: â€˜+ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Why Build an SSO integration with Okta?) https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Use case examples) Why is this here?: Oktane 2024: Need additional research on which specific use cases customers are looking for.
